Container.Name: Christmas Community
Container.Overview: A simple place for your entire family to use to find gifts that people want and avoid double-gifting.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: gifts christmas holiday planning planner share coordinate
Container.Changes:
### 2024-09-29
Move redirect URL to advanced settings
### 2024-09-27
Fix default redirect URL and database location
### 2024-09-23
Initial release

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 80

Config.Name: Enable Public Lists
Config.Description: Allow viewing wishlists without logging in

Config.Name: Enable Single List Mode
Config.Description: Limit to only one list (only the admin account's list). Useful for weddings, birthdays, etc.

Config.Name: Use Table Mode
Config.Description: true - Use table layout, false - use legacy card layout

Config.Name: Site Title
Config.Description: Title of the site, displayed on page and navigation bar

Config.Name: Short Site Title
Config.Description: Short title of the site, used when shared to home screen

Config.Name: Allow Markdown in notes
Config.Description: Allow markdown in notes. Does not work when Table Mode is disabled.

Config.Name: Show Available Update Notices
Config.Description: Check for updates and show a notice if an update is available.

Config.Name: Enable Profile Pictures
Config.Description: Enable profile pictures.

Config.Name: Bulmaswatch Theme
Config.Description: Bulmaswatch theme to use: https://jenil.github.io/bulmaswatch.

Config.Name: Database location
Config.Description: Internal (in container) database location

Config.Name: Web Server Port
Config.Description: Port to run the web server on. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Expose Database Port
Config.Description: Expose internal PouchDB port. Mostly for debugging. Leave empty to disable.

Config.Name: Proxy server
Config.Description: Proxy server to use for requests. Leave empty to disable.

Config.Name: Session Cookie Secret
Config.Description: Secret to use for session cookies. Leave empty to generate a random secret.

Config.Name: Session Max Age
Config.Description: Max age of session cookies in milliseconds.

Config.Name: Root Path
Config.Description: Root path to serve the site from. Useful for proxying.

Config.Name: Login Failure Redirect
Config.Description: Redirect to this page after a login failure.

Config.Name: Proxy Forwarded Trust Source
Config.Description: Trust the X-Forwarded-For header from this source. Set to 'loopback' to trust all.

Config.Name: Enable Amazon Smile
Config.Description: Amazon Smile has been discontinued, set this to false to avoid potential issues.

Config.Name: Language
Config.Description: Language to use.
